text: Manikya Koodaram is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by George Mannur and starring Vijayakumar and Ashokan in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Thilakan * Ashokan * Meera * Charmila * Vijayakumar * Abi * Shammi Thilakan * Tony * Krishnaprasad * Bindu Varappuzha * Bobby Kottarakkara * Elias Babu * Omana Ouseph * Santhakumari * VK Sreeraman * Vayalar Rana ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Manikya Koodaram
